function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Public mistrust of private sector involvement in data management","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health risk, data source","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mentions of serving and interacting with a neighborhood and people, potentially indicating close contact and interaction.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of political will and central coordination","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through twitter feeds discussing loneliness and covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement of laser treatment and sunlight exposure for reusable graphene-coated face masks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The recent outbreak of covid-19 has endangered the health of the world’s population and has hampered the global economy.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in vaccination clinics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges around space, water, and sanitation in informal settlements increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective water system maintenance leading to potential contamination and transmission of waterborne diseases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of face-to-face interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of green open spaces in urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of international collaboration and information sharing on contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient negative air ionization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient medication delivery","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased incidence of ipv during lockdowns, with economic stress and confinement at home being correlated with different types of violence.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical precedents of infectious diseases driving urban renewal and architectural design","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unprecedented national debt from support packages","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy in office areas can lead to easier transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable technology not optimized for different groups with different lifestyles and circumstances, leading to discomfort and potential health issues.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict measures and lockdown may have been eased too early","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Political orientation not associated with compliance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction and housing instability associated with comorbidities and mental health conditions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on urban green spaces for mental health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on digital risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in priorities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly diverse bacterial communities in the built environment dust posing a potential risk of disease transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divergent national positions undermining international solidarity in fighting risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control benefits from uv lamps and hepa filtration","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wearable risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations/heterogeneity in the relationships between built and natural environment, chronic disease, and covid-19 mortality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress, fatigue, poor mental well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in the development of a commercially viable vaccine for risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differential impact on different social groups due to vbds transmission","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate risk
